name: plug.dj - Transparent miscellany
description: Everything else I refused to touch before. Ideally you should have Transparent UI and Transparent playlist and menus installed to go with this.
obsoletion_message: plug.dj is now a Rowl-owned asset, and has returned to business.
additional_info:
Information Also see these other styles: Transparent UI Transparent buttons and menus Transparent playlist and user menus Transparent dashboard and store Transparent dialog boxes This style affects the following:
  • Playlist button icon
  • History button icon
  • Experience bar secondary colour
  • Social media menus
12/15/14.1 Initial release 12/15/14.2 Added plugcubed button 12/23/14 Rearranged the code to be more neat, and added Radiant Community Script's skip button. 12/24/14 I forgot comma pls forgib. 02/16/15 Stuff about user input fields. 02/27/15 New shop button! 06/20/15 Signup button! With the new guest mode you no longer need to sign into a plug.dj account to hear awesome music.
